translations: n.菊石；[古生]菊石类（ammonite 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 亚扪人, 菊石类, 菊石, 亚摩力人

sentences.sentence: It is still in Rabbah of the Ammonites.
sentences.translation: 现今岂不是在亚扪人的拉巴吗？

sentences.sentence: Some time later, when the Ammonites made war on Israel.
sentences.translation: 过了些日子，亚扪人攻打以色列。

sentences.sentence: Ammonites also inspired this cathedral staircase in Barcelona, Spain.
sentences.translation: 西班牙巴塞罗那一处教堂楼梯的设计灵感就来自于菊石。
